Detailed Description

Editor for editing a text inside a horizontal scrollable line.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

LineEditor::LineEditor (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

INT  input_mapper_id,
const WCHAR *  text = 0
) 
 

Parameters:
parent Parent control which embeds the component.
input_mapper_id ID of the input mapper. See InputMapper::Id for details. The corresponding instance of the input mapper can be defined in EditConfig::CreateInputMapper().
text Pointer to text, which will be copied to the internal buffer.

INT LineEditor::GetMaxTextLength (   )  const

void LineEditor::SetMaxTextLength (  INT  max_tex_len  )

BOOLEAN LineEditor::SetProperty (  ResourceParser &  parser,
const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id
) 
 

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.
